articles.name: LinkedIn Post
articles.text: Posting my thoughts and feelings about my journey in the Boot Camp so far

articles.name: Article 2
articles.text: Writing code is less about “just working”. Instead, it’s much more about creativity. It’s similar to creative writing in that the author architecting a story must use an assortment of tools and components.
